official-title.#text: Providing for consideration of the Senate amendments to the bill (H.R. 3547) to extend the application of certain space launch liability provisions through 2014; providing for proceedings during the period from January 17, 2014, through January 24, 2014; and for other purposes.

committee-name.#tail: , reported the following resolution; which was referred to the House Calendar and ordered to be printed

amendments thereto, and to consider in the
, without intervention of any point of order, a single motion offered by the chair of the

amendments and the motion shall be considered as read. The motion shall be debatable for one hour equally divided and controlled by the chair and ranking minority member of the

text.#text: That upon adoption of this resolution it shall be in order to take from the Speaker's table the bill (
Upon adoption of the motion specified in the first section of this resolution,

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: may insert in the Congressional Record not later than January 16, 2014, such material as he may deem explanatory of the
amendments and the motion specified in the first section of this resolution.

text.#text: On any legislative day during the period from January 17, 2014, through January 24, 2014—
the Journal of the proceedings of the previous day shall be considered as approved; and

the Chair may at any time declare the House adjourned to meet at a date and time, within the limits of clause 4, section 5, article I of the Constitution, to be announced by the Chair in declaring the adjournment.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: may appoint Members to perform the duties of the Chair for the duration of the period addressed by section 4 of this resolution as though under clause 8(a) of rule I.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Speaker of the House of Representatives
